channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description: Ok i am wondering if anyone can help me with like you know a rare shop because i just wanted to put up a rare shop so i used auto spawn.cfg and i spawned santa and i went to shops.cfg and i put shop 44 and then i put in all the stuff that i wanted too be in there and now i go on the server and I cant trade santa any help??? OK i fixed that but now i need to know how to make santa tradeable because when i go in and i put the stuff in it wont let me trade him it only says talk. How would i fix this?

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @guthan38 guthan38
item.description:
@guthan38 wrote:

Make sure you add the Wanneshop in client and make sure you add santa under any other shopâ€¦
